Setting.Name: Number of values in expanded blocks
Low Pass Filter Signal Before Downsampling

Comment.Text: The visualizer sends the events on the P300 timeline to the Acquisition Server using Software Tagging (TCP Tagging) after rendering them
This LUA script creates the sequence of events that happen during the scenario.
You can browse each box' documentation by selecting the box and pressing F1
Currently the flash groups and the group type sequence are always the same and read from premade files.

Overview This scenario illustrates unsupervised P300 speller based on the work of David HÃ¼bner, Thibault Verhoeven, Pieter-Jan Kindermans, Michael Tangermann and others. On each trial, you can either focus on the proposed letter or any letter of your choice while avoiding focusing on the # symbols. After several trials, the prediction accuracy should start to increase. Note: the recorded files go to the folder where the scenario xml is located (${Player_ScenarioDirectory}/).
